articles.title: Foreign Ministry Says DPRK Ready for Dialogue and War
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Says DPRK Ready for Dialogue and War  
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Tuesday as regards the start of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in south Korea:
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities finally kicked off nuclear war exercises aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK defying its repeated warnings and the concern of the international community.
					
					 They launched such large-scale war exercises at a time when the DPRK government advanced an important proposal for building a lasting peace-keeping regime on the Korean Peninsula. This cannot be interpreted otherwise than a grave provocation. It is an act of chilling the efforts to realize the denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 This fact indicates that though there was a regime change in the U.S. there is no change in the U.S. administration's hostile policy towards the DPRK, a policy to bring down by force the ideology and system chosen by its people. The U.S. is leaving no means untried to bring down the DPRK including military threat, economic sanctions and ideological and cultural poisoning.
					
					 Military threat and economic sanctions cannot go with dialogue based on equality and they are incompatible with the process for denuclearization, in particular. Without a peace treaty it is impossible to defuse the military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula and it can never be denuclearized unless this confrontation is put to an end. The justice of the DPRK's proposal for concluding a peace treaty has been proved once again.
					
					 The DPRK is fully ready for dialogue and war. It will continue bolstering up its nuclear deterrent as long as the U.S. military threats and provocations go on.

articles.title: June 15 All-Korean Committee Meets
articles.content:
June 15 All-Korean Committee Meets
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A meeting of chairmen of the north, south and overseas sides to the All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration (June 15 All-Korean Committee) took place here on Mar. 7 and 8. 
					 Present there were the delegation of the North Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration led by Chairman An Kyong Ho, the delegation of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration headed by permanent representative Kim Sang Gun, and the delegation of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration led by Chairman Kwak Tong Ui.
					
					 At the meeting the chairmen were unanimous that the north-south summit in Pyongyang in June, 2000 and the publication of the June 15 joint declaration marked a historic event as it dispelled the distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and ushered in a new era of national reconciliation, unity and reunification. 
					
					 The meeting discussed practical issues arising in bringing about a new phase of national unity and the country's reunification under the banner of the north-south joint declaration this year marking the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					
					 According to the press release issued at the meeting, its participants decided to open with splendor an event common to the nation to commemorate the anniversary with representatives of all political parties and organizations and personages of different circles in the north, the south and abroad supporting the declaration attending. 
					
					 It was agreed to hold a main meeting, a photo exhibition, inter-sector meeting, art performance and others under the program of the event. 
					
					 It was also decided to hold colorful functions in the north, the south and abroad to suit the actual conditions. 
					
					 The three sides to the committee decided to separately form preparatory committees in order to successfully promote the event common to the nation and regional functions. 
					
					 It was agreed to hold joint events of organizations in different fields and of various circles between the north and the south for the purpose of stirring up the atmosphere of the movement for reunification among Koreans in the run-up to the above-said anniversary. 
					
					 They decided to have a working-level contact at an early date to further the consultations about the venue of the event and other issues.

articles.title: DPRK Abounds with Schoolchildren's Palaces
articles.content:
DPRK Abounds with Schoolchildren's Palaces
						
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A schoolchildren's palace is under construction in Phyongsong City, South Phyongan Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the DPRK the children are called "king" of the country and the government spares nothing for them.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, who had paid a close attention from the early years of his revolutionary activities to raising and educating the younger generation regarding it as an issue decisive of the future of the revolution, proposed the building of a children's palace on a hill in downtown Pyongyang after the liberation of the country.
					
					 He believed that though palaces had been dedicated to kings in the past, such buildings should be built for the rising generation in liberated Korea and that the prosperity of the nation depends on the education of the children. 
					
					 During the Korean war the palace was destroyed badly due to indiscriminate bombing of the U.S. imperialists. But in the postwar period when the country was undergoing severe difficulties it was reconstructed over ten times larger than the previous one, named Pyongyang Students and Children's Palace.
					
					Thanks to his noble view on the coming generation, many schoolchildren's palaces have been built throughout the country. Among them are the Kim Song Ju Schoolchildren's Palace, February 16 Schoolchildren's Palace, Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace, "1,000-ri Journey for National Liberation" Schoolchildren's Palace, Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace and Kaesong Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 Girls and boys are fully cultivating their talent at the palaces, growing to be pillars of socialist Korea.

articles.title: Section Doctor System Working
articles.content:
Section Doctor System Working
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- All the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea enjoy medical benefits on a regular basis thanks to the section doctor system.
					 The popular system was established by President Kim Il Sung to improve the health of the people.
					
					 The state trains many able medical workers and assigns them to hospitals and clinics every year to take charge of medical care of each section's inhabitants.
					
					 Doctors in charge learn about eating habits of people and sanitary conditions of their families and their working places and render them preventive treatment services. They also diagnose diseases in early stage and cure them in time.
					
					 Taking into account various conditions such as population of districts, their health conditions, hygienic conditions of their families and working places, and doctors' ability and amount of work, the state properly separates production units and residential quarters for the section doctor system.
					
					 Under the well-organized section doctor system the people can take medical treatment at any time and at any place including isolated islands, rural communities and industrial establishments.
					
					 Foreigners who witnessed the advantage of the socialist health system of Korea admired its people for having their own doctors irrespective of age and position.

articles.title: Authorities' Hindrance to Improved Relations Accused in S. Korea
articles.content:
Authorities' Hindrance to Improved Relations Accused in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on March 5 accusing the south Korean puppet authorities of their anti-reunification racket such as interrupting national reconciliation and cooperation and arresting the improvement of the north-south relations.
					 The statement charged that the authorities are blocking the resumption of tour of Mt. Kumgang and the Kaesong area, repeatedly talking about "three-point condition" though the north has made its sincere efforts for improved inter-Korean relations and national reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 It held that the present regime itself should refrain from threatening the people's life by dint of repressive armed forces before urging someone to "ensure personal safety".
					
					 If the authorities leave indelible wounds on the nation's strong desire for inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation, they will be cursed and denounced by all the fellow countrymen, it warned.

articles.title: Czechoslovak Party Denounce US-S. Korea War Exercises
articles.content:
Czechoslovak Party Denounce US-S. Korea War Exercises  
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party issued a statement on Mar. 4 in denunciation of the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces.
					Intensively hurled into the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are over 18,000 troops including at least 10,000 U.S. imperialist aggressor troops present in south Korea, latest military hardware, the south Korean puppet army and even its militia, the statement noted, saying: The exercises can never be justified as they are an open war provocation that renders the regional situation tense and obstructs the process of peace and reconciliation in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It further said:
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities truly want detente and peace in the peninsula they should discontinue all sorts of military exercises against the DPRK and immediately withdraw the U.S. forces from south Korea.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party expresses full support for the DPRK, strongly urging the U.S. to drop its hostile and aggression policy toward the DPRK and stop Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.

articles.title: Korean Exhibition Held in Russia
articles.content:
Korean Exhibition Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition was held in Russia from Mar. 2 to 6.
					 Displayed in its venue were works of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, photos on his immortal Songun leadership feats and handicrafts associated with the Korean people's wisdom and talents.
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were personages of different circles and popular masses.
					
					 The participants laid a floral basket and bouquets before the portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The minister of Culture of the Amur Regional Administration said in his speech that the exhibition intensively shows the efforts and achievements made by the Korean people to build a great prosperous and powerful nation with their own strength and technology. Through the exhibition the Russian people will get a better understanding of the development of the DPRK, he added.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- One day in January Juche 89 (2000) General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Sinuiju Shoes Factory.
					 At the injection-molding workshop, he took a pair of shoes in his hands and asked an official of the factory about its brand.
					
					 Produced for export the pair of quality injection-molded shoes was trademarked in a foreign language.
					
					 Being briefed on the fact, he said with a gloomy expression that it is more important at present to supply shoes to local people than to export them to other countries and that injection-molded shoes should be mass-produced for local people, even though much money are needed.
					
					 After his field guidance the factory began producing shoes with Korean-language trademarks, "Junma" (steed) and "Kalmaegi" (seagull).

articles.title: Reunion de los presidentes del Comite Conjunto Nacional
articles.content:
Reunion de los presidentes del Comite Conjunto Nacional
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar los dia 7 y 8 en esta capital la reunion de los presidentes de las partes Norte, Sur y ultramar del Comite Conjunto Nacional por la Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					　En la ocasion participaron las delegaciones de las partes Norte, Sur y ultramar del citado comite encabezadas por el presidente An Kyong Ho, el delegado permanente Kim Sang Gun y el presidente Kwak Tong Ui.
					
					　En la reunion, los presidentes subrayaron que el encuentro de Pyongyang efectuado en junio de 2000 y la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio fueron los eventos historicos que eliminaron la desconfianza y confrontacion entre el Norte y el Sur y abrieron una nueva epoca de la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
					
					　En el conclave fueron discutidos los problemas practicos para abrir en el ano en curso del aniversario 10 de la publicacion de la citada declaracion una nueva coyuntura de la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur.
					
					　Segun el documento publicado en el acto, decidieron celebrar solemnemente el acto conjunto nacional por el aniversario 10 de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio bajo la participacion de los delegados de todos los partidos politicos, entidades y las personalidades de distintos estratos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar que apoyan dicha declaracion; organizar este acto conjunto dividiendolo en el acto principal, la foto-exhibicion, encuentros por ramas, la funcion artistica, etc., desarrollar tambien en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar diversas actividades conforme a sus realidades; constituir por separado los comites preparatorios para llevar al exito el acto conjunto nacional y otras actividades regionales conmemorativas; efectuar las actividades conjuntas de las entidades por ramas y capas entre el Norte y el Sur para crear el ambiente pannacional por la reunificacion en visperas del aniversario 10 de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta arriba
					
					  mencionada y tener dentro del corto tiempo el contacto de expertos para seguir discutiendo los problemas pendientes incluido el lugar del acto.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a intensificar la ofensiva general
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a intensificar la ofensiva generala
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun difundio un editorial en su edicion de este martes exhortando a todos a hacer que conviertan este ano significativo en el de gran cambio, que se registre en letras mayusculas en la historia de construccion de una gran potencia prospera, al dar otro acicate a la marcha de gran auge para la mejora de la vida del pueblo uniendose en un haz en torno al Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					  El mitin de la ciudad de Hamhung para festejar la inauguracion de la moderna Fabrica de Vinalon, que significo un gran jubilo nacional, devino el de la unidad monolitica que manifesto la ferrea voluntad de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de construir a toda costa una gran potencia prospera sobre la tierra patria bajo la guia del Dirigente, senala el editorial y continua:
					
					  Durante ese mitin significativo, el Dirigente saludo con la mano alzada a los participantes desde la tribuna exponiendose a la nieve.
					
					　Viendo la sublime imagen de el, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y los habitantes de todo el pais percibieron con gran emocion el noble llamamiento patriotico de ese gran hombre sin par a cumplir, cueste lo que cueste, la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera, que fue deseo de toda la vida del Presidente       Kim Il Sung, uniendose firmemente con la unica alma y unico proposito.
					
					  Igualmente, tomaron el juramento de glorificar para siempre el periodo de gran prosperidad iniciado por el Dirigente poniendo en pleno juego la potencia espiritual basada en la unidad monolitica.
					
					  La unidad monolitica constituye el simbolo de la dignidad y la invencibilidad de la Corea del Songun y el potente remedio para construir una gran potencia prospera.
					
					  La figura de los participantes vitoreando a toda voz al Dirigente en dicho acto multitudinario fue la gran escena epica que se puede ver solo en la RPDC donde el lider y el pueblo estan unidos de cuerpo y alma.
					
					  Ahora el pueblo coreano entro en su camino ancho y recto que le conducira a la victoria y la prosperidad, y la velocidad de avance y auge de la patria crece cada dia mas.
					
					  El gran milagro de vinalon de la Corea del Songun, que agito a todo el mundo y significo el gran triunfo del socialismo al estilo coreano, deviene un hito historico que infundio la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria y multiplico la fuerza y el coraje del ejercito y el pueblo coreanos que avanzan como torrente hacia la victoria final de la gran potencia prospera dando pasos agigantados del gran auge por la vida del pueblo en respuesta al llamamiento combativo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					  Hay que crear sin parar los milagros y meritos de la epoca del Songun en todos los dominios al seguir llevando al climax el impetu revolucionario que habia inundado el mitin de la ciudad de Hamhung, para convertir este ano del 65o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC en el ano que traiga la alegria al pueblo y estallen los vitores al socialismo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun manifiesta rechazo al enfrentamiento de sistemas sociales
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun manifiesta rechazo al enfrentamiento de sistemas sociales
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos tiempos, en el Sur de Corea se tornan mas freneticas que nunca las maniobras en busca de la confrontacion con el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					  En un articulo individual publicado este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califica de grave traicion que impide la reunificacion del pais y la unidad de la nacion y lleva a la fase extrema las relaciones intercoreanas, y prosigue:
					
					  La banda de traidores habla cada dia mas ruidosamente de la supuesta "situacion bruscamente cambiada" que no va a suceder nunca. 
					
					　Entre tanto, los "organismos a cargo de las relaciones con el Norte" y los "organos de estudio de la politica estatal" del Sur de Corea libran en gran medida y de manera simultanea la campana conflictiva con el sistema de la RPDC para llevar a la realidad su ambicion de lograr la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" negando abiertamente la dignidad y el regimen de ella.
					
					  Este hecho comprueba que tales acciones de la banda de conservadores surcoreanos llegan al climax sobrepasando el limite de peligro. 
					
					  El desenlace final de ellas sera la guerra de agresion al Norte de Corea. 
					
					  Es decir, los esfuerzos desesperados de los titeres surcoreanos por la "reunificacion bajo el sistema democratico liberal" daran lugar evidentemente a la guerra de agresion a la RPDC para derrocar el regimen de esta mediante la invasion armada. 
					
					  Por culpa de las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas, las relaciones intercoreanas llegan a la fase cada vez mas catastrofica pese a la unanime aspiracion de la nacion y la Peninsula Coreana corre el cada vez mayor peligro de guerra anti-RPDC.
					
					  Seran realmente graves las consecuencias que emanen del enfrentamiento de sistemas sociales que persiguen los conservadores surcoreanos.
					
					  El pueblo coreano castigara duro a nombre de la epoca y la nacion a los que niegan atrevidamente la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC y se entregan a la confrontacion de regimenes sin tomar en consideracion la reconciliacion, la unidad y la reunificacion de la nacion.
